name: CTRL_
description:
2D puzzle platformer where you control parts of the level instead of the player. 

Play through 9 levels (and 1 secret level if you can find it) of varying difficulties. 

Use a limited amount of classic keyboard shortcuts CRTL-X, CRTL-C, and CRTL-V to cut, copy, and paste parts of the level, before or after the player moves, to make the auto moving box get to the goal. 

Press space to get the box to grind across the floor towards the goal. Once the box is moving it does not stop.

Use CTRL-R to reload a level when you need to try again.

A game by Daniel Hackman and Steven Taylor

with special thanks for Dominique Dean for audio work
